statblock.name: Lich
statblock.damage_immunities: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
statblock.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: The lich is a 13th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 16). It knows the following spells:

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
traits.desc: If damage reduces the lich to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, rounded down. On a success, the lich drops to 1 hit point instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The lich makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Scepter
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 4) force damage.

actions.name: Spell
actions.desc: The lich casts a spell from its spell list.

legendary_actions.name: Legendary Actions (3/Turn)
legendary_actions.desc: The lich can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time, and only at the end of another creature's turn. The lich regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Cast a Spell
legendary_actions.desc: The lich casts a spell from its spell list.

legendary_actions.name: Make a Melee Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The lich makes a melee attack.
